lines.text:
[singing]
Crumbly Crunchies are the best / Look delicious on your vest / Serve them to unwanted guests / Stuff the mattress with the rest.
Have you prepared a statement for the press?
No, no! I don't want to go! I'm too young to fly! Stop! I've got a wife and kids - millions of kids! Help! I don't wanna be a hero!

[after being caught by K-9]
Gee, kid. I didn't know you cared.
No, no, don't leave. There's a beautiful Earth out tonight.
